mapper.select: select r.* from sys_manage_role r left join sys_manage_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join sys_manage_user u on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{userName}
select r.role_id roleId,r.role_name roleName,r.remark, rm.menu_id menuId from sys_manage_role r left join sys_manage_role_menu rm on(r.role_id = rm.role_id) where r.role_id = #{roleId}
